name: Styn Vercauteren
intro1: Hello! I'm a passionate Medior Frontend Developer with a Bachelor's Degree in Applied Informatics.
intro2: At 25, I've already gained valuable work and academic experience in test-driven, agile website development. I've honed my skills at Oddball / Purple Panda and DXC FDS.
intro3: Now I'm now eager to take on a new challenge as a Frontend Developer, preferably in the Antwerp area.

block1.title: Oddball / Purple Panda
block1.text1: I worked as a dedicated Frontend Developer with a proven track record at Oddball, which later merged with Purple Panda.
block1.text2: Initially part of a four-member team, I eventually took on the responsibility of leading the team single-handedly. Specializing in React development, I have also gained experience in deploying websites to Google Cloud.
block1.text3: I am seeking opportunities to leverage my technical skills and leadership experience in a challenging new role.

tvc.title: TheValueChain
tvc.description: I co-developed the website for Gumption's largest company. Responsibilities included creating the website itself using components, bug fixes and handling change requests post-launch.

brightest.title: Brightest
brightest.description: Our team also developed a website for Gumption's second largest company. The project involved similar tasks and technologies as TheValueChain, including post-launch maintenance.

linc.title: Linc.legal
linc.description: I collaborated on the creation of a website for a law firm based in Antwerp, using the same technology stack as the previous projects.

block1.technologies: All of these websites use these technologies:
block1.responsibility: It was also my responsibility for the go-live. This includes deploying the website and configuring DNS.

block2.title: DXC FDS
block2.text1: Here I worked primarily as a consultant for the Flemish Government. I spent the first year modernizing the Gebruikersbeheer, the internal authorization panel, by converting legacy code into separate APIs.
